item.title: Obstruction to highway and excessive branches over property, 28th July
item.description:
The tree in front on 14 Maple Road requires heavy pruning. I cannot recall it had ever been done in the 4 years we have resided here. Neighbouring trees are being pruned, but not this one, I can only assume because a report or complaint is neccessary. The tree in question has long shoots at the base so it is dangerous going from drive to road due in the car due the blocked View. Also, the tree has many low hanging branches affecting light into the property and many dead branches which continually fall and are a hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Maple Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 118-122, 28th July
item.description:
Caller said there is a 2 meter wide pothole in the middle of the road that is causing cars to get damaged when they go across it and also the cracks spread out. this is dangerous and they would like to have someone sent out to have a look at it as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 106, Fleet Road, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Veolia rubbish collection container, 28th July
item.description:
Veolia has abandoned a broken very large rubbish container on pavement. Has been there for over a month. It’s the ones they use to empty recycling into from households before connecting to rear of vehicle and emptying. The bottom is split and Veolia have dumped it on the pavement which is narrow and it blocks prams and walkers.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Yester Road, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two Failed Reinstatements, 28th July
item.description:
Failed Reinstatement contrary to the NRSW Act 1991. Is anyone from the council / Highway authority auditing the contractors' reinstatements and holding them to account to make good shoddy reinstatements? Needs to be permanently rectified under the undertaker's warranty obligations.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hadlow Road, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet
